title: I'd like to ask an OCE Rioter a question about the Dominion removal.
body:
First of all, has there been any talk at all about this becoming a part of the matchmaking queues at least for the last few days of it's life?

If so, is there going to be an announcement about it?
or
If not, then why isn't this mode going to be allowed to give one final farewell to a server that has practically been begging for it for it's entire lifetime?

Because the section under the announcement is getting bombarded by people who are both angry and sad right now and the only feedback we had was an NA Rioter who's comment has already fallen below the comment threshold.

replies.body: Having Dominion enabled for a week or two (or until every other server loses it) would be really good for the community and Riot's reputation.
I say open the flood gates!
